column5: As Ive said earlier Im hopefully moving to the Rideau Lakes in March. I was up there today and checked about 10 lakes that are within minutes from my house. To my great surprise every one has a good ramp which is free. Most of them also have concrete docks . They also post signs asking fishermen not to fish near the Bass spauning grounds in May and early June and to practice catch and release. Another nice touch is most ramps I checked have picnic tables and parks.  Now all I have to do is sell my house. LOL
Sounds nice Eddy, good luck with the sale!
House will sell Eddy, market is picking up... need any advice feel free to ask... it is what I do for a living!

Thought you were on the water already Eddyk........Oh well Sounds like your new place is going to be close to many lakes tho..... A fisherman's dream Bud..... Good Luck with getting your house sold...at a little profit would be nice too!
....Will the new house have room for me and three kids? I'd like to think so as it appears you're moving into heaven.
Good luck with the sale of the house Eddy, and don't forget to post the date of the house warming for the new place    Just please try to make it in the summer when it's nice and warm  Maureen
Good luck Eddy.   Is your brother helping with lake selection    ?  Jim
No Mistyriver. Unless the lake is full of 50inch Muskies Lew is pretty well lost.
Good luck. I hope you enjoy the area. I grew up just south of there and I never encountered a pay launch until I moved away. You are truly moving to fish heaven.
